name: 2d-platformer-game
description: A 2D side-scrolling platformer game built with Phaser.js and TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build:watch & npm run server:dev
scripts.server:dev: nodemon --exec "npm run compile && node dist/server.js" --watch src --ext ts
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run server

author: Game Developer
